title: HOW TO SUSTAIN APY + TVL +CAP + LIQUIDITY
body:
HOW TO SUSTAIN APY + TVL +CAP + LIQUIDITY in one portion

This will mean we can return to full deflation again

We have zero products at the moment but lots of holders of DRC so we need to build products that have a large burn so holders can buy!  this way we can keep DRC supply below 10 Million and allow us to keep minting up to 10 million when the supply drops due to product burn %

products that we could make are

Simple Lottery done asap with daily randomizer paid daily
Product like Yieldwars.com, Vault, NFTs. 

All will have a % burn reducing the circulating supply down.
choices: Yes make products for DRC holders to buy
author: 0xe5df77b5c1C541cDA961bAFBdaB2b9FB94831f98
